name: DURGA-MD BY AMEEN SER
description: A Whatsapp Bot With Most Premium Features Makes Your Whatsapp Premium.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here. Same as Above

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Fill the value true if you want to see Messages in Console.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value false if you not want bot to read all messages.

DISABLE_PM.description: Disable bot in pm, Take it false if you wanna run bot in your pm

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Take it 'true' if you  wanna show Always Onlline on whatsapp

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

SESSION_ID.description: Please put your SESSION_ID here,if you don't have visit to get Session id

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Enter the message here which you want to see when a new user joins a Group.

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.

AUTO_REACTION.description:
Set it `true` If You Wants To Reacts emoji to all commands. 
 And Set it `all` is You Wants to React Emojies to All Messages
